name: cru_ts_405_pre_monthly_mean
title: Monthly Precipication - CRU TS (v4.05)
description: Montly precipitation from Climate Research Unit (CRU) in millimeters. Version 4.05
details: Created by extracting monthly precipitation data from CRU

extract_types_info.max: maximum precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum precipitation value per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Harris, I., Osborn, T.J., Jones, P. et al. Version 4 of the CRU TS monthly high-resolution gridded multivariate climate dataset. Sci Data 7, 109 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-020-0453-3
